metadata.name: Ti64_Bolt_Manufacturing_Process
metadata.title: Titanium Ti-6Al-4V Bolt Manufacturing Process Traveller
metadata.description: Complete AS9100D-compliant manufacturing process for aerospace-grade titanium bolts. Includes material receipt through final shipping with full quality control, inspection gates, and process documentation per AS9100D requirements.

nodes.name: Start
nodes.description: Manufacturing process initiated upon receipt of Production Order

nodes.name: Retrieve Ti64 Bar from Storage
nodes.description: Pull specified length of Ti-6Al-4V bar stock from controlled raw material storage per Production Order requirements
processActivities: Verify PO number and material specification
Locate material in storage using heat/lot number
Move material to receiving inspection area

identifiedRisks.mitigation: Dual verification of heat/lot number against PO
System requires cert scan before material release

documentationReferences: WI-MM-001: Raw Material Storage and Retrieval

nodes.name: Material Receiving Inspection
nodes.description: Verify material conformity: correct alloy, proper cert, no damage, within specification limits
decisionCriteria: Material cert shows Ti-6Al-4V per AMS 4928
Heat/lot number on material matches cert
No surface damage or contamination visible
Material cert is current and complete
nodes.decisionMethod: Visual and dimensional inspection per WI-QC-001

identifiedRisks.mitigation: Independent dual inspection for aerospace materials

decisionRiskLevel.reject: Medium - potential schedule delay for replacement

documentation.traceabilityReference: RIR number linked to PO and heat/lot
documentation.retentionPeriod: Life of part + 10 years per AS9100D

documentationReferences: AS9100D Clause 8.6: Release of Products and Services

nodes.name: QC, MRB & Quarantine Material
nodes.description: Segregate non-conforming material, create NCR, notify procurement for replacement

nodes.name: Cut to Size
nodes.description: Cut Ti64 bar to specified blank length per engineering drawing using abrasive saw
processActivities: Verify drawing revision and blank length
Set up abrasive saw per WI-CUT-001
Cut blanks to length + machining allowance
Mark each blank with heat/lot number

identifiedRisks.mitigation: First piece inspection before batch cutting
Mark each blank immediately after cutting

documentationReferences: WI-CUT-001: Abrasive Cutting of Titanium Alloys

nodes.name: Post-Cut Inspection
nodes.description: Verify blank length, perpendicularity, surface condition, traceability marking

nodes.name: Hot Forging
nodes.description: Heat blanks to forging temperature and form bolt head using closed-die forging process
processActivities: Load blanks into furnace (heat soak 10 min)
Transfer to forging press within 30 seconds
Form head in 2-3 strikes per WI-FRG-001
Mark with heat/lot and forging date

resources.timeRequired: 2 hours per batch setup + 5 min per piece

identifiedRisks.mitigation: First piece inspection before batch processing

documentationReferences: WI-FRG-001: Hot Forging of Titanium Fasteners
AS9100D Clause 8.5.1.2: Control of Special Processes

nodes.name: Post-Forging Inspection
nodes.description: Inspect for cracks, die fill, dimensions, surface defects using visual + penetrant inspection
nodes.decisionMethod: Visual + Fluorescent Penetrant Inspection (FPI) per ASTM E1417
documentationReferences: ASTM E1417: Standard Practice for Liquid Penetrant Testing

nodes.name: Salt Bath Cleaning
nodes.description: Remove forging scale and surface oxides using molten salt bath

nodes.name: Post-Cleaning Inspection
nodes.description: Verify complete scale removal, no pitting or etching from cleaning process

nodes.name: Re-clean Parts
nodes.description: Return to salt bath for additional cleaning cycle

nodes.name: Heat Treatment
nodes.description: Solution treat and age to achieve specified mechanical properties (minimum 130 ksi UTS)

monitoring.acceptanceCriteria: Hardness and tensile properties within AMS spec

identifiedRisks.description: Incorrect heat treatment results in low strength
identifiedRisks.mitigation: Continuous chart recording + test coupon destructive testing

documentationReferences: AMS 2801: Heat Treatment of Titanium Alloys

nodes.name: Post-HT Inspection
nodes.description: Verify hardness, microstructure (sampling), tensile properties via test coupons
decisionCriteria: Hardness: Rockwell C 34-40 (3 locations per sample)
Test coupon tensile: UTS ‚â•130 ksi, Yield ‚â•120 ksi
nodes.decisionMethod: Hardness testing + destructive test coupon analysis
evidenceRequired: Tensile test report from test coupon

decisionRiskLevel.reject: Critical - entire batch scrapped or re-heat treated

nodes.name: Re-Heat Treat or Scrap
nodes.description: If properties low: re-heat treat (if within limits). If out of spec: scrap entire batch
processActivities: Determine if re-heat treat is permissible
Re-process or scrap per NCR disposition

nodes.name: CNC Machining
nodes.description: Machine threads, OD, and hex on CNC lathe to final dimensions per engineering drawing
processActivities: Load CNC program and verify rev level

checkpoints: Statistical process control (SPC) on critical dims

identifiedRisks.mitigation: First piece inspection + frequent gauge checks

nodes.name: Post-Machining Inspection
nodes.description: Full dimensional inspection: threads, OD, hex, length, perpendicularity per drawing
decisionCriteria: Thread: GO gauge passes, NO-GO gauge rejects
No tool marks or surface defects

nodes.name: Rework Machining
nodes.description: Re-machine if oversized, scrap if undersized or threads damaged

nodes.name: Solution Cleaning
nodes.description: Remove machining oils and contaminants using alkaline cleaning solution
processActivities: Immerse in alkaline cleaner (180¬∞F) for 10 minutes

nodes.name: Post-Solution Cleaning Inspection
nodes.description: Verify complete cleanliness using water break test

nodes.name: Re-clean Parts
nodes.description: Return to cleaning tank for additional cycle

nodes.name: Apply Protective Coating
nodes.description: Apply dry film lubricant or passivation per customer specification
processActivities: Verify coating material batch and shelf life
Document coating batch and cure cycle

monitoring.measurementCriteria: Thickness per spec, cure profile recorded

identifiedRisks.mitigation: Thickness measurement on sample before full batch

nodes.name: Post-Coating Inspection
nodes.description: Verify coating thickness, uniformity, adhesion, appearance
nodes.decisionMethod: Thickness measurement + visual inspection + adhesion test

nodes.name: Strip and Re-coat
nodes.description: Chemical strip coating and re-apply

nodes.name: Final Inspection & Packaging
nodes.description: 100% final inspection, package per customer requirements, prepare Certificate of Conformance
processActivities: Verify all process steps completed per traveller
Generate Certificate of Conformance (C of C)
Attach material cert and test reports
Label with PO number, part number, quantity, heat/lot

monitoring.acceptanceCriteria: 100% conformance to customer PO and drawing

documentationReferences: AS9100D Clause 8.6: Release of Products and Services

nodes.name: Final Acceptance Decision
nodes.description: Quality Manager final review and release authorization
decisionCriteria: All quality records complete and accurate
No open NCRs against this batch
Traceability complete from raw material to finished product
nodes.decisionMethod: Final quality review of complete documentation package

decisionRiskLevel.reject: High - potential customer complaint if shipped

documentation.decisionRecord: Required - Final release signature on C of C
documentation.traceabilityReference: Complete from raw material cert through all processes
documentation.retentionPeriod: Life of part + 10 years per AS9100D

documentationReferences: AS9100D Clause 8.6: Release of Products and Services

nodes.name: Hold for Review
nodes.description: Hold shipment, engineering review, customer notification if required

nodes.name: Ship to Customer
nodes.description: Ship product with complete quality documentation per customer requirements
processActivities: Prepare shipping container per customer spec
Include C of C and supporting documentation
Generate packing slip and shipping label

nodes.name: End
nodes.description: Manufacturing process complete - product delivered to customer with full quality documentation

successMetrics.qualityMetrics: Zero customer complaints on this PO

nodes.continualImprovement: Process data collected for monthly review and improvement opportunities

nodes.name: Production Order
nodes.description: Customer PO specifying part number, quantity, delivery date, special requirements

nodes.name: Engineering Drawing
nodes.description: Controlled drawing with dimensions, tolerances, material spec, finish requirements

nodes.name: Material Certification
nodes.description: Mill cert showing chemistry, heat treatment, test results for Ti64 bar stock

nodes.name: Complete Quality Records
nodes.description: Full traceability package: all inspection reports, test results, certs, traveller

nodes.name: Finished Ti64 Bolts
nodes.description: Aerospace-grade titanium bolts meeting all drawing and specification requirements

edges.name: material rejected - process terminated
edges.description: Non-conforming material rejected, new material required

edges.name: held pending disposition
edges.description: Product held for engineering review and customer notification
